description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义经济学家，原名薛萼果。曾任中国国家统计局副局长、中国科学院经济研究所所长等职。因其经济学观点在文化大革命期间入狱。
description.en: A Chinese Marxist economist, originally named Xue Eguo. He served as Deputy Director of the National Bureau of Statistics of China and Director of the Institute of Economics of the Chinese Academy of Sciences. He was imprisoned during the Cultural Revolution for his economic views.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党员，孙冶方在无锡县立第一高等小学的老师，对其接受共产主义思想产生重要影响。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China and Sun Yefang's teacher at Wuxi County No. 1 Higher Primary School, who had a significant influence on his acceptance of communist ideas.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方加入中国共产党的介绍人。
description.en: The person who introduced Sun Yefang to the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党，孙冶方于1924年加入该党。
description.en: The ruling party of China, which Sun Yefang joined in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 位于苏联莫斯科的一所大学，孙冶方曾在此学习和任教。
description.en: A university in Moscow, Soviet Union, where Sun Yefang studied and taught.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾与孙冶方在莫斯科中山大学同学。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who was a classmate of Sun Yefang at Moscow Sun Yat-sen University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾与孙冶方在莫斯科中山大学同学。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who was a classmate of Sun Yefang at Moscow Sun Yat-sen University.

nodes.id: 莫斯科东方劳动者大学

zh-cn: 莫斯科东方劳动者大学
en: Communist University of the Toilers of the East

description.zh-cn: 位于苏联莫斯科的一所大学，孙冶方曾在此担任政治经济学讲课翻译。
description.en: A university in Moscow, Soviet Union, where Sun Yefang served as a translator for political economy lectures.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，其宗派主义和肃反扩大化错误导致孙冶方受到处分。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China whose factionalism and expansion of purges led to Sun Yefang being disciplined.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，孙冶方的叔伯兄弟，曾与孙冶方合办《中国农村》杂志，并发起成立孙冶方经济学基金会。
description.en: A Chinese economist, Sun Yefang's cousin. He co-founded the magazine 'China's Rural Areas' with Sun Yefang and initiated the establishment of the Sun Yefang Economic Science Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者，曾指导孙冶方掌握经济研究和调查的方法。
description.en: A Chinese scholar who guided Sun Yefang in mastering methods of economic research and investigation.

en: Shanghai University of Finance and Economics

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的财经类大学，孙冶方曾任该校院长。
description.en: A finance and economics university in Shanghai, where Sun Yefang served as president.

en: National Bureau of Statistics of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的直属机构，孙冶方曾任副局长。
description.en: A direct subordinate institution of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, where Sun Yefang served as deputy director.

nodes.id: 中国社会科学院经济研究所

zh-cn: 中国社会科学院经济研究所
中国科学院经济研究所
en: Institute of Economics, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中国的经济学研究机构，孙冶方曾任所长及名誉所长。
description.en: An economics research institution in China, where Sun Yefang served as director and honorary director.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1982年至1992年间的中央组织机构，孙冶方曾任委员。
description.en: A central organization of the Communist Party of China from 1982 to 1992, where Sun Yefang served as a member.

en: Academic Degrees Committee of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的直属机构，孙冶方曾任其评议组成员。
description.en: A direct subordinate institution of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, where Sun Yefang served as a member of its review group.

description.zh-cn: 由杨坚白、张卓元等人在《红旗》杂志发表的文章，该文的发表导致孙冶方在1964年被打成“张孙反党联盟”。
description.en: An article published in the 'Red Flag' magazine by Yang Jianbai, Zhang Zhuoyuan, and others. Its publication led to Sun Yefang being labeled as part of the 'Zhang-Sun anti-Party clique' in 1964.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的理论刊物，曾发表《生产价格论》一文并批判孙冶方。
description.en: A theoretical journal of the Communist Party of China, which published the article 'On the Price of Production' and criticized Sun Yefang.

description.zh-cn: 《红旗》杂志人员，《生产价格论》的作者之一。
description.en: A staff member of 'Red Flag' magazine and one of the authors of 'On the Price of Production'.

description.zh-cn: 《红旗》杂志人员，《生产价格论》的作者之一。
description.en: A staff member of 'Red Flag' magazine and one of the authors of 'On the Price of Production'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，1964年因《生产价格论》一文与孙冶方一同被打成“张孙反党联盟”。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China who, along with Sun Yefang, was labeled as part of the 'Zhang-Sun anti-Party clique' in 1964 due to the article 'On the Price of Production'.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一场政治运动，在此期间孙冶方蒙冤入狱。
description.en: A political movement in China during which Sun Yefang was wrongfully imprisoned.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的监狱，主要关押高级别政治犯。孙冶方在文革期间在此被囚禁7年。
description.en: A prison in Beijing primarily for high-ranking political prisoners. Sun Yefang was imprisoned here for 7 years during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国哲学社会科学研究的最高学术机构和综合研究中心，孙冶方曾任其顾问。
description.en: The highest academic institution and comprehensive research center for philosophy and social sciences in the People's Republic of China, where Sun Yefang served as a consultant.

description.zh-cn: 民族资本家，孙冶方的兄长。
description.en: A national capitalist and the elder brother of Sun Yefang.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方的妻子。
description.en: Sun Yefang's wife.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方的养女。
description.en: Sun Yefang's adopted daughter.

description.zh-cn: 苏联领导人，其著作《苏联社会主义经济问题》被孙冶方系统性质疑。
description.en: Leader of the Soviet Union whose work 'Economic Problems of Socialism in the USSR' was systematically questioned by Sun Yefang.

nodes.id: 苏联社会主义经济问题

zh-cn: 苏联社会主义经济问题
en: Economic Problems of Socialism in the USSR

description.zh-cn: 斯大林的经济学著作，孙冶方是第一个对其提出系统质疑的中国经济学家。
description.en: An economic work by Stalin; Sun Yefang was the first Chinese economist to systematically question it.

nodes.id: 社会主义市场经济体制

zh-cn: 社会主义市场经济体制

description.zh-cn: 中国的经济体制改革方向，孙冶方是其早期倡导者之一。
description.en: The direction of China's economic system reform, of which Sun Yefang was one of the early advocates.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，与孙冶方等人力主实行社会主义市场经济体制，并发起成立孙冶方经济学基金会。
description.en: A Chinese economist who, along with Sun Yefang and others, strongly advocated for the implementation of a socialist market economic system and initiated the establishment of the Sun Yefang Economic Science Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，与孙冶方等人力主实行社会主义市场经济体制。
description.en: A Chinese economist who, along with Sun Yefang and others, strongly advocated for the implementation of a socialist market economic system.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，发起成立孙冶方经济学基金会。
description.en: A Chinese economist who initiated the establishment of the Sun Yefang Economic Science Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 为纪念经济学家孙冶方而设立的基金会，由薛暮桥、于光远等人发起成立。
description.en: A foundation established in memory of economist Sun Yefang, initiated by Xue Muqiao, Yu Guangyuan, and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省下辖地级市，孙冶方的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province, China, and the birthplace of Sun Yefang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都，孙冶方的逝世地。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, where Sun Yefang passed away.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方于1908年10月24日出生于江苏无锡。
description.en: Sun Yefang was born in Wuxi, Jiangsu on October 24, 1908.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方受到其老师张志和的影响，接受了共产主义思想。
description.en: Sun Yefang was influenced by his teacher Zhang Zhihe and accepted communist ideas.

description.zh-cn: 董亦湘于1924年介绍孙冶方加入中国共产党。
description.en: Dong Yixiang introduced Sun Yefang to join the Communist Party of China in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方于1924年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Sun Yefang joined the Communist Party of China in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方于1925年被选派到莫斯科中山大学学习。
description.en: Sun Yefang was selected to study at Moscow Sun Yat-sen University in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方毕业后留校任政治经济学讲课翻译。
description.en: After graduation, Sun Yefang stayed at the university as a translator for political economy lectures.

relationships.target: 莫斯科东方劳动者大学

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方曾在莫斯科东方劳动者大学任政治经济学讲课翻译。
description.en: Sun Yefang once served as a translator for political economy lectures at the Communist University of the Toilers of the East.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方与邓小平在莫斯科中山大学是同学。
description.en: Sun Yefang and Deng Xiaoping were classmates at Moscow Sun Yat-sen University.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方与叶剑英在莫斯科中山大学是同学。
description.en: Sun Yefang and Ye Jianying were classmates at Moscow Sun Yat-sen University.

description.zh-cn: 因王明的宗派主义和肃反扩大化错误，孙冶方被给予“最后警告处分”。
description.en: Due to Wang Ming's factionalism and the expansion of purges, Sun Yefang was given a 'final warning'.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30年代，孙冶方与薛暮桥合办《中国农村》杂志。
description.en: In the 1930s, Sun Yefang and Xue Muqiao co-founded the magazine 'China's Rural Areas'.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方在陈翰笙的指导下掌握了经济研究和调查的方法。
description.en: Under the guidance of Chen Hansheng, Sun Yefang mastered the methods of economic research and investigation.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方曾任上海财经学院院长。
description.en: Sun Yefang served as the President of Shanghai College of Finance and Economics.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方曾任中国国家统计局副局长。
description.en: Sun Yefang served as the Deputy Director of the National Bureau of Statistics of China.

relationships.target: 中国社会科学院经济研究所

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方曾任中国科学院经济研究所所长，后任中国社会科学院经济研究所名誉所长。
description.en: Sun Yefang served as Director of the Institute of Economics of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and later as Honorary Director of the Institute of Economics of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方曾任中共中央顾问委员会委员。
description.en: Sun Yefang served as a member of the Central Advisory Commission of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方曾任国务院学位委员会评议组成员。
description.en: Sun Yefang served as a member of the review group of the Academic Degrees Committee of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 1964年，因《生产价格论》一文，孙冶方被打成“张孙反党联盟”，并被撤销一切职务。
description.en: In 1964, due to the article 'On the Price of Production', Sun Yefang was labeled as part of the 'Zhang-Sun anti-Party clique' and was dismissed from all his posts.

description.zh-cn: 1964年，因《生产价格论》一文，张闻天与孙冶方一同被打成“张孙反党联盟”。
description.en: In 1964, due to the article 'On the Price of Production', Zhang Wentian was labeled as part of the 'Zhang-Sun anti-Party clique' along with Sun Yefang.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚白是《生产价格论》的作者之一。
description.en: Yang Jianbai was one of the authors of 'On the Price of Production'.

description.zh-cn: 张卓元是《生产价格论》的作者之一。
description.en: Zhang Zhuoyuan was one of the authors of 'On the Price of Production'.

description.zh-cn: 《红旗》杂志发表了《生产价格论》一文。
description.en: The 'Red Flag' magazine published the article 'On the Price of Production'.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，孙冶方蒙冤入秦城监狱7年。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Sun Yefang was wrongfully imprisoned in Qincheng Prison for 7 years.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方在文革期间被关押在秦城监狱7年。
description.en: Sun Yefang was detained in Qincheng Prison for 7 years during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方逝世前任中国社会科学院顾问。
description.en: Before his death, Sun Yefang served as a consultant to the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 薛明剑是孙冶方的兄长。
description.en: Xue Mingjian was Sun Yefang's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 薛暮桥是孙冶方的叔伯兄弟。
description.en: Xue Muqiao was Sun Yefang's paternal cousin.

description.zh-cn: 洪克平是孙冶方的妻子。
description.en: Hong Keping was Sun Yefang's wife.

description.zh-cn: 李昭是孙冶方的养女。
description.en: Li Zhao was Sun Yefang's adopted daughter.

relationships.target: 苏联社会主义经济问题

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方是对斯大林《苏联社会主义经济问题》提出系统质疑的中国经济界第一人。
description.en: Sun Yefang was the first person in Chinese economic circles to systematically question Stalin's 'Economic Problems of Socialism in the USSR'.

relationships.target: 社会主义市场经济体制

description.zh-cn: 孙冶方力主实行社会主义市场经济体制。
description.en: Sun Yefang strongly advocated for the implementation of a socialist market economic system.

relationships.target: 社会主义市场经济体制

description.zh-cn: 于光远力主实行社会主义市场经济体制。
description.en: Yu Guangyuan strongly advocated for the implementation of a socialist market economic system.

relationships.target: 社会主义市场经济体制

description.zh-cn: 薛暮桥力主实行社会主义市场经济体制。
description.en: Xue Muqiao strongly advocated for the implementation of a socialist market economic system.

relationships.target: 社会主义市场经济体制

description.zh-cn: 马洪力主实行社会主义市场经济体制。
description.en: Ma Hong strongly advocated for the implementation of a socialist market economic system.

description.zh-cn: 于光远是孙冶方经济学基金会的发起人之一。
description.en: Yu Guangyuan was one of the founders of the Sun Yefang Economic Science Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 薛暮桥是孙冶方经济学基金会的发起人之一。
description.en: Xue Muqiao was one of the founders of the Sun Yefang Economic Science Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 徐雪寒是孙冶方经济学基金会的发起人之一。
description.en: Xu Xuehan was one of the founders of the Sun Yefang Economic Science Foundation.
